text: Brittany "Britt" Benn (born April 23, 1989) is a Canadian rugby union player. She represented at the 2014 Women's Rugby World Cup. She was a member of the touring squad that played and in November 2013. Benn won a gold medal at the 2015 Pan American Games as a member of the Canadian women's rugby sevens team. In 2016, she was named to Canada's first ever women's rugby sevens Olympic team that went on to win the bronze medal for Canada. == Honours and achievements == * 2017, Canada Sevens Langford dream team * 2019, Canada Sevens Langford performance tracker player of the round ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female rugby union players Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Canada Category:Canada international rugby sevens players Category:Female rugby sevens players Category:Sportspeople from Belleville, Ontario Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada Category:Olympic medalists in rugby sevens Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in rugby sevens
title: Brittany Benn
